title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 212 - Conference and Hearings
content:

State Regulations
§ 212.1 - Intervention
§ 212.2 - Conference
§ 212.3 - Conduct of hearings
§ 212.4 - Formal hearing
§ 212.5 - Briefs and proposed findings
§ 212.6 - Decision and order

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 212

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, art. 14, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
